name: davidwaterston.goto-matching-bracket
title: Go to Matching Bracket
description: Instantly locate and place the cursor on the matching bracket to the one under the cursor. Simply place the cursor on any one of {, }, (, ), [ or ] then press CTRL-ALT-RIGHT (CMD-ALT-RIGHT on Mac) or use the 'Navigate... Go to Matching Bracket' menu item to locate and place the cursor on the matching opening or closing bracket. NOTE: v2.0.0 changes the hotkey for compatibility with Brackets 1.3.
author: David Waterston
